thread.title: Man shot to death by Islamabad police for not stopping car at checkpost
thread.title_full: Man shot to death by Islamabad police for not stopping car at checkpost

author: Arsalan Altaf
title: Man shot to death by Islamabad police for not stopping car at checkpost
text:
Share Tweet Email PHOTO: EXPRESS 
A 27-year-old man was shot dead by police firing in Islamabad on Friday after he allegedly did not stop when an police official signaled him to. 
Police shoot dead two brothers for allegedly failing to stop for security checks in Pindi 
According to initial reports, Taimoor Riaz was passing by the Sabzi Mandi area in Islamabad with a friend when police asked him to stop his car. 
“When they didn’t stop, the policemen fired at them and a bullet hit Taimoor on his head,” a police official told The Express Tribune. It’s not yet certain whether the friend was injured in the firing. PHOTO: EXPRESS 
A murder case has been filed at Sabzi Mandi police station against Constable Samiur Tariq by the deceased’s brother, Sajid Riaz. Both policemen involved in the incident fled the scene and are currently at large.
